summary: Provides a pipeline manager that prepares and runs a graph‑based prediction workflow. It merges YAML configuration files, renders execution scripts from Jinja2 templates, builds data, model, and pipeline objects via factory helpers, incorporates a user‑defined configuration class, and exposes a command‑line interface to launch the generated script.
business_intent: Streamline the deployment of graph prediction models by automating configuration handling, script generation, and execution, allowing users to quickly set up and run reproducible graph‑learning pipelines.
